event.incoming_comms_text: This is Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg from DamCom Alpha, sir. ^We had a hard radiation burst down here, and it looks like Ensign Cobb got the worst of it. ^Sickbay has him now, but it doesn't look good.
Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg here, sir. ^I regret to inform you that Cadet Mayweather died while manually overriding the deck's pressure doors. ^If not for her, none of us would have made it.
Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg here, sir. ^We've encountered a hull breach. ^Midshipman Fielding was... well, he's no longer aboard, sir.
This is Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg, sir. ^We've got a coolant leak here that just froze Ensign Rogers solid. ^Poor kid shattered like a cheap Denubian crystal.
Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg again, sir. ^Ensign Matthews just lost most of his skull when a panel overloaded. ^Tell sickbay not to hurry, poor guy never had a chance.
Lt. Cmdr. Feinberg again, sir. ^I'm fairly confident I can get this conduit working without any problem whatsoev---*SIGNAL LOST*
Lt. Jacoby from DamCom Beta reporting in, sir. ^That last explosion took out Crewman Caine. ^He was a bright kid with the whole universe in front of him. ^Earn him some payback, will you?
This is Lt. Jacoby. ^I'm sorry to report that Lt. Jefferson volunteered to venture into the warp core to re-align the primary phase sequencers. ^He saved us all, sir, everyone but himself.
Lt. Jacoby to bridge. ^It's my sad duty to report that Midshipman Satai was lost during a failed attempt to restore the power grid on this deck. ^He'll be missed.
Lt. Jacoby here, sir. ^I'm sorry to report that Crewman Lo'ren was killed by falling debris. ^You can rest assured that my team will carry on in her honor, sir.
Lt. Jacoby reporting in, sir. ^We just lost Crewman Clark to a subspace implosion while trying to enact repairs. ^That poor bastard was only two days away from retirement, too.
This is Lt. Jacoby, sir. ^I'm beginning my repairs on the damaged area now. ^Hey, that wire's not supposed to be---*SIGNAL LOST*

This Lt. Frost from DamCom Delta, sir. ^That last blast caused some kinda subspace harmonic shockwave. ^It caught Lt. Nichols dead center. ^For what it's worth, I don't think she felt anything when it happened.

warning_popup_message.message: This Lt. Frost from DamCom Delta, sir. That last blast caused some kinda subspace harmonic shockwave. It caught Lt. Nichols dead center. For what it's worth, I don't think she felt anything when it happened.

event.incoming_comms_text: This is Lt. Frost. ^I'm sorry to report that Cadet Pierre was re-constituting the primary phase buffers when they overloaded. There's... not a lot of him left, sir. Thankfully.
Lt. Frost to bridge. ^Ensign Morgan was unfortunately killed in the line of duty.
Lt. Frost here, sir. ^We lost Ensign N'Gert while trying to contain a plasma fire. ^It should be noted that his actions probably saved the entire deck.
This is Lt. Frost, sir. ^This section of the deck depressurized, and unfortunately, Lt. Myers was on the wrong side of the pressure doors.
Lt. Frost reporting in, sir. ^I've managed to isolate the array buffer, so now all I need to do is simply connec---*SIGNAL LOST*
Prepping Shuttle one now Bridge.
Shuttle one is ready to launch Bridge.
Launching Shuttle one!
Aye, returning to the ship. Prepare for docking.
Shuttle one coming into land.
Bri... We have ta.... ...age! Sys.... offline, requ... ...gency beam o... *signal lost*

Bridge, this is shuttle two. We are ready to launch.
Shuttle two away!
Aye, returning to the ship. Prepare for docking.
Shuttle two approaching hanger bay.
He... We a.. ..king he... dama.. reqe.... ...iate trans.... *signal lost*
Bridge, we are getting Shuttle three ready to launch.
Shuttle three is ready to launch Bridge.
Shuttle three away!
Aye, returning to the ship. Prepare for docking.
Bridge, we've landed..
Sys.... off.... we hav.. .. power. Lie.. supp... fail... ple... ...am .. out. *signal lost*
Prepping Shuttle four for launch.
Bridge, shuttle four is ready to go on your command.
Shuttle four has cleared hanger doors.
Roger Bridge, we are heading back.
Bridge, we're on the deck.
May... ...day, we ha... lo... a.. wer. Emer... ... out. *signal lost*

Bridge, shuttle five is ready to launch.
Shuttle five is away.
On our way back to the ship..
